name: Crystal Caverns (itch) (benjames171)
description:
Battle your way through 4 dark underground caverns and find the Platform to Heaven. Use your skills (you have skills, right?) to overcome one challenge after another. So many things are out to get you, from spikey fortifications to weird popping tennis ball things.

Collect all the orange crystals within each cavern to gain 5 extra lives. You'll probably be needing those.

Controls
A/D or ARROW KEYS to move left and right
SPACE to jump

If you're running the Windows version and have an Xbox 360 controller to hand, you can use that instead.

Made in 4 days with DEFOLD for Platformer Week and WGJ #86

NOTE : at time of writing the Linux and OSX builds are untested by me. If they work/don't work for you please leave a comment below so others will know.

Have fun! This is a hard game if that wasn't already clear. Thanks for having a go.
